content.html: Hey Jennifer, do us a favor; We won’t delegitimize or diminish how hard you’ve worked for your career if you promise to show the same respect for Creators. You’re welcome to come sit behind my work desk anytime to see what it’s really like.
content.value:
Hey Jennifer, do us a favor; We won’t delegitimize or diminish how hard you’ve worked for your career if you promise to show the same respect for Creators.

You’re welcome to come sit behind my work desk anytime to see what it’s really like.
